name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

task.description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at their defaults
task.name: wineexec

content:
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Activision/X-Men Origins - Wolverine(TM)/Binaries/Wolverine.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
